description: Schema for validation of the chunk embeddings as produced by GTE

chunks.title: Chunk Embeddings
chunks.description: Container for chunk-level embeddings derived from lingproc chunk segmentation and chonkie

lg.description: the two-letter ISO language identifier produced by lingproc

chunk_id.description: Index of the chunk in the chunk array produced by lingproc.

embedding.description: The vector embedding representation of the chunk.

items.description: A single number in the chunk's vector embedding.

size.description: The size of the embedding vector.

o.description: Character offset where the chunk begins in the original text.

ts.title: Timestamp
ts.description: Timestamp of when the embeddings were generated.

ci_id.title: Content Item ID
ci_id.description: Canonical impresso ID of the content item.

model_id.title: Model ID
model_id.description: Model identifier according to impresso model description schema.

lingproc_path.title: Linguistic Processing Path
lingproc_path.description: S3 path to the lingproc output from which chunk boundaries were derived.

git.title: Git Commit
git.description: Git commit or tag of the processing pipeline used to generate the embeddings.
